alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 09 at 7:33PM CST until December 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN HOLMES AND NORTHEASTERN YAZOO COUNTIES... At 733 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ebenezer, or 10 miles south of Lexington, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Durant, Goodman, and Franklin around 740 PM CST. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for central and north central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
